subject: Hmmmm, older=better?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I copied what I did in box 1 for the white noise generator. In newer boxes,
ones that I thought I could make work better, the white noise/random voltage
takes several minutes to come on, with the original circuit, it's like three
seconds! This is dual supply powered, or +12 and -12 volts.

 F-S
